# Roleplay Rule 6 - New Life Rule
When you die you dont remember who killed you or how, simple as.
If you go into crit, but are revived; this does not apply.
## Examples
### [bold] Permitted [/bold]
- Remembering someone crit you, if medbay revived you before you died.
### [bold] Not Permitted [/bold]
- Giving details on who and how you died to security after you were revived. - Hunting your killer down after you died, if not told about them by someone else.
